name: Stickshift
description:
Well it's a long story but here I am, stranded on route 95 on the way to my respectable business job! But what's this?! This isn't my BRAND NAME car!!! I've never even seen a stickshift before.

I gotta buckle up and figure this contraption out before my boss  finds out and fires the shift outta me.

I reckon I gotta use these arrow keys to manipulate the Stickshift™ user interface in the bottom right of the screen, but it's just a hunch!

Made at the Global Game Jam 2018!
